metadata.feature_description: Subscribe to posts or walls to receive notifications of new activity

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream
steps.expected: Activity Stream with posts should be visible
steps.actual: Community page loaded with Activity Stream showing multiple posts

steps.action: Locate a post with 'Subscribe' link and click it
steps.expected: Link should change to 'Unsubscribe' indicating successful subscription
steps.actual: Clicked Subscribe link on post. Link changed to 'Unsubscribe' and a notification badge appeared confirming subscription

steps.action: Locate a post with 'Unsubscribe' link (previously subscribed) and click it
steps.expected: Link should change back to 'Subscribe' indicating successful unsubscription
steps.actual: Clicked Unsubscribe link on the post. Link changed back to 'Subscribe' confirming unsubscription

steps.action: Navigate to another user's profile (Content Editor user)
steps.expected: User profile page with Activity Feed should load
steps.actual: Content Editor's profile page loaded with Activity Feed showing wall subscription toggle button

steps.action: Click the wall subscription toggle button (#tbar-subscribe)
steps.expected: Button should become selected and tooltip should change to 'Unsubscribe from Updates'
steps.actual: Clicked wall subscription button via JavaScript. Button added 'selected' class and tooltip changed to 'Unsubscribe from Updates'

steps.action: Click the wall subscription toggle button again while subscribed
steps.expected: Button should become deselected and tooltip should change to 'Subscribe to Updates'
steps.actual: Clicked wall subscription button. Button removed 'selected' class and tooltip changed to 'Subscribe to Updates'

steps.action: Navigate away from the page and return to Community Activity Stream
steps.expected: Subscription states should persist - previously subscribed posts should still show 'Unsubscribe', unsubscribed posts should show 'Subscribe'
steps.actual: Navigated back to Community page. Subscription states persisted correctly: 'This is a test post created for Post Creation and Management testing' shows 'Unsubscribe' (subscribed), 'Test post to verify like own post' shows 'Subscribe' (unsubscribed)

observations: The wall subscription button (#tbar-subscribe) is not directly visible in the accessibility tree and requires JavaScript interaction to click
Post subscription state changes are reflected immediately in the UI without page refresh
The subscription API endpoints (SubscribeToPost, UnsubscribeFromPost, SubscribeToWall, UnsubscribeFromWall) are implemented in SubscriptionsController.cs and require ValidateAntiForgeryToken

Notification test scenario was not explicitly tested as it would require waiting for actual notifications from other user activities - code review confirms notification integration exists via ICommentsNotifications
